org.apache.hadoop.fs.ceph

Class CephInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • org.apache.hadoop.fs.FSInputStream
        • org.apache.hadoop.fs.ceph.CephInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, org.apache.hadoop.fs.PositionedReadable, org.apache.hadoop.fs.Seekable

    public class CephInputStream
extends org.apache.hadoop.fs.FSInputStream

    An FSInputStream for a CephFileSystem and corresponding Ceph instance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CephInputStream(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, org.apache.hadoop.fs.ceph.CephFsProto cephfs, int fh, long flength, int bufferSize)
      Create a new CephInputStream.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int available()
      Find the number of bytes remaining in the file.
      void close()
      Close the CephInputStream and release the associated filehandle.
      protected void finalize()
      Ceph likes things to be closed before it shuts down, so closing the IOStream stuff voluntarily in a finalizer is good
      long getPos() 
      int read()
      Read a byte from the file.
      int read(byte[] buf, int off, int len)
      Read a specified number of bytes from the file into a byte[].
      void seek(long targetPos) 
      boolean seekToNewSource(long targetPos)
      Failovers are handled by the Ceph code at a very low level; if there are issues that can be solved by changing sources they'll be dealt with before anybody even tries to call this method!

      • Methods inherited from class org.apache.hadoop.fs.FSInputStream

        read, readFully, readFully, validatePositionedReadArgs

    • Constructor Detail

      • CephInputStream

        public CephInputStream(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                       org.apache.hadoop.fs.ceph.CephFsProto cephfs,
                       int fh,
                       long flength,
                       int bufferSize)
        Create a new CephInputStream.
        Parameters:
        conf - The system configuration. Unused.
        fh - The filehandle provided by Ceph to reference.
        flength - The current length of the file. If the length changes you will need to close and re-open it to access the new data.

                int off,
                int len)
         throws IOException
        Read a specified number of bytes from the file into a byte[].
        Overrides:
        read in class InputStream
        Parameters:
        buf - the byte array to read into.
        off - the offset to start at in the file
        len - the number of bytes to read
        Returns:
